programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. programme.title: Toulouse vs Montpellier - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Special Coverage Arab Cup FIFA Qatar 2025
programme.desc: The second edition of the FIFA Arab Cup is scheduled to be held in Qatar from December 1 to 18, 2025. The tournament will be hosted across six venues, all of which were utilized during the FIFA World Cup™ three years prior. As with Qatar 2022, Al Bayt Stadium will host the tournaments opening match, while the prestigious Lusail Stadium will serve as the venue for the final. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the Arab Cup Qatar 2025 on BeIN Sports News.

programme.title: Fanes Atmosphere - Arab Cup FIFA Qatar 2025
programme.desc: The FIFA Arab Cup Qatar 2025 has successfully revived the vibrant festival atmosphere reminiscent of the World Cup in Qatar. The tournament has been transformed into an accessible, family-friendly public celebration through the implementation of large-scale fan zones, cultural activations, efficient transportation, and strategic promotions. A key element of this success is the establishment of numerous high-profile fan hubs, providing supporters with engaging spaces to gather well before kick-off.

programme.title: Special Coverage Arab Cup FIFA Qatar 2025
programme.desc: The second edition of the FIFA Arab Cup is scheduled to be held in Qatar from December 1 to 18, 2025. The tournament will be hosted across six venues, all of which were utilized during the FIFA World Cup™ three years prior. As with Qatar 2022, Al Bayt Stadium will host the tournaments opening match, while the prestigious Lusail Stadium will serve as the venue for the final. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the Arab Cup Qatar 2025 on BeIN Sports News.

programme.title: Press Conference 2025
Fanes Atmosphere - Arab Cup FIFA Qatar 2025
programme.desc: The FIFA Arab Cup Qatar 2025 has successfully revived the vibrant festival atmosphere reminiscent of the World Cup in Qatar. The tournament has been transformed into an accessible, family-friendly public celebration through the implementation of large-scale fan zones, cultural activations, efficient transportation, and strategic promotions. A key element of this success is the establishment of numerous high-profile fan hubs, providing supporters with engaging spaces to gather well before kick-off.

programme.title: Vålerenga vs Paris FC - UEFA Women’s Champions League 2025/2026 - MD5
programme.desc: The 2025/2026 UEFA Womens Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. This is the first season under a new format, which have 18 participating teams, playing six games each against different opponents in a league phase, all in a joint group. The teams are competing for a place in the final that will be played at the Ullevaal Stadion in Oslo, Norway on May 2026. Barcelona are the current Champions.

Panathinaikos vs Viktoria Plzeň - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD6
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.
